name: Gentle Pull
description: Slow steady resistance - perfect for beginners

name: Rapid Thrashing
description: Quick erratic movements in all directions

name: Steady Pull
description: Consistent resistance in one direction

name: Jumping Escape
description: Fish leaps out of water trying to escape

name: Violent Thrashing
description: Aggressive shaking that can snap the line

name: Deep Dive
description: Fish dives straight down with force

name: Bulldogging
description: Fish uses its weight to resist being pulled up

name: Long Sprint
description: Fish makes extended runs in one direction

name: Power Run
description: Explosive bursts of speed and strength

name: Aerial Acrobatics
description: Fish jumps and performs aerial maneuvers

name: Circle Fighting
description: Fish swims in circles to confuse the angler

name: Bass Fury
description: Explosive power with territorial aggression

name: Pike Ambush
description: Lightning-fast strikes from concealment

name: Eel Shock
description: Electrical discharges with unpredictable movements

name: Ancient Wisdom
description: Methodical movements with unpredictable intelligence

name: Marlin Acrobatics
description: High-speed runs and spectacular aerial displays

name: Shark Frenzy
description: Relentless aggression with feeding frenzy attacks

name: Whale Depths
description: Immense power with deep soundings and surface breaches

name: Megalodon Destroyer
description: Prehistoric terror with devastating attacks

name: Mosasaurus Ancient
description: Marine reptile with unpredictable prehistoric patterns

name: Leviathan Chaos
description: Mythical beast using all patterns with reality-warping power
